proc setMode(self: TextDocumentEditor; mode: string) {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Sets the current mode of the editor. If mode is "", then no additional scope will be pushed on the scope stac.k If mode is e.g. "insert", then the scope "editor.text.insert" will be pushed on the scope stack above "editor.text" Don't use "completion", as that is used for when a completion window is open. Source   Edit
